website_summaries.verdict: A rustic yet elegant farmhouse-style coffee table with a solid, durable wooden top and sturdy metal legs.
pros: Large surface area and good height at 30 inches
Offers plenty of room on the storage shelf below
Strong metal legs and solid wooden tops
The natural finish will complement most contemporary and traditional homes
cons: The rustic finish of each table can vary slightly, so may look a little different from stock photo

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happier with this purchase. Came super fast, very easy to assemble, quality wood and stain. Very pleased! Very solid table.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dahlberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Solid Table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table. It is the perfect color and size. It's quite heavy which I secretly wanted. I always hated when my husband kept dragging our crummy little old coffee table super close to the couch every time he'd sit to watch TV every day. The dragging would wear out the carpet! So happy the new table is heavy. Now he can't drag it!!! Yipppeeee!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! We loved this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! We loved this coffee table. I'm so glad I purchased. Other reviews mentioned a smell when pulled out the box. There was a slight odor for a few hours but nothing that was unbearable and I'm very sensitive to smells. It fits perfect and actually looks more expensive than it is. It's sturdy and was fairly easy to put together by my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Jakubczyk

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! The wood appears to actually be reclaimed barn wood which is exactly the look I was going for. I put it together myself with just a hand from my son in less than 1/2 hour. The screws go into predrilled/threaded metal holes and instead of being hard to line up like most "assemble at home" items, it was a piece of cake. They all lined up right away and the directions were fantastic. I've come to expect directions with pictures that you have to study to decipher what they want you to do but the instructions with this table have instructions in plain English. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharyl Felice

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, But Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 4 star rating if it wasn't for the missing bolts that didn't come with the whole assembly. Don't get me wrong, it is a very good, sturdy table that can't just be pushed around so easily. It's heavy & I like how it feels but you would think the manufacture would have put the most important thing in the 2 packages that was sent to me are the bolts to assemble the whole thing. I had to make a trip to the hardware store just to get the bolts & of course the inconvenient. The 48" table is perfect size for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: David Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with bolts/screws or instructions. So I have a couple of hundred pound paper weights until I can figure out what size bolts to buy. See reviews - this is a recurring problem. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Enoch L.

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Very sturdy and heavy, well built. Holes all line up, six long bolts for the top and six smaller bolts for the bottom. They provide an allen wrench to tighten down the bolts. I bought the large table, if your not very strong, get someone to help you, pretty heavy. Comes in two boxes, one very big (around 4 feet by 5 feet) has the top and bottom inside. The other box is small, holding the legs and hardware.
customer_reviews.author: PolishBob

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Table looks nice. The wood has a very warm feeling and is very sturdy. Solid wood for both top and bottom pieces. The iron is hollow with a semi gloss finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware for Second Time
customer_reviews.text: We returned the first extremely heavy piece because the hardware/bolts were missing. Certainly this couldn't happen a second time... It did. No hardware or bolts.... A joke...
customer_reviews.author: James Carney

customer_reviews.title: Missing Screws
customer_reviews.text: I loved this table at first glance, espically the size. Ordered it but there was no bolts or screws when I opened the package. Had to talk to customer service (call 802-888-7975) and let them know. They took care of it and sent directions and bolts within a couple days I got it. The table is not a flat surface, don't mind but for those who are wondering. Very easy to put together, it is somewhat heavy but it can be a one person job. Had to get it up the stairs piece by piece so yeah. All in all good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joelli

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but was missing bolts
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, arrives in two boxes. Legs in one, solid top and bottom in other. Wrong hardware. Bottom hex bolts correct. M6x70mm (six of them), missing and I needed to order. Now together and a keeper, but took extra work which shouldn't be with expensive item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this table! Rustic meets contemporary
customer_reviews.text: Perfect choice for my coffee table (I purchased the large). The reclaimed wood top and shelf (with intentional imperfections) combined with black square metal frame is the perfect solution for my decor. This thing is HEAVY! Arrived unassembled in 2 boxes. Many people may need lifting help getting it inside upon delivery. A cinch to assemble, this thing is a great buy compared to similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Beth in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Informal and functional coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Just love the rustic look, the two shelves and metal detail is perfect for informal basement. I’ll stack books on the bottom shelf and maybe some flowers on top. I’ll be fine with people putting their feet on them or beers. Love this table. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Heavy too. Only wish they made them in a square.
customer_reviews.author: Lochin Smith

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, heavy-duty, and easy to assemble. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CzechNovots

customer_reviews.title: Lack of bolts
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, however came with no hardware, bolts, etc. Had to go to Home Depot and figure out what to buy. Called Alaterre customer service through Amazon, was told their customer service rep was gone for the day...3pm Eastern, and only 1 rep? Didn't want a replacement since this table is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Moran

customer_reviews.title: I only received one of the 2 boxes. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I only received one of the 2 boxes. I have the legs and no wood pieces... Not sure what to do? Box 2 of 2 was delivered but Box 1 of 2 never showed up. I have legs but no coffee table - 3 days later I received the actual wood. Very happy with the coffee table now!
customer_reviews.author: jjb

customer_reviews.title: Solid & easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised how sturdy and crafted this looks, yet it is only 4 pieces and very simple assembly (~10 minutes solo) with all screws & allen wrench provided.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Bad wood
customer_reviews.text: Developed this nasty crack 2 months in, didn't abuse it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G

customer_reviews.title: Natural look, but not too rustic.
customer_reviews.text: I got this table and the matching display shelves. They are very heavy, but I was able to put them together myself with no issues. I love the weight and size, it fills the space nicely. They are natural without being too rustic, and the wood looks nice. I’m very happy with this table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good, one bolt didn't fit, but considering it's weight there is no way to make it move
customer_reviews.author: Kirill Kulakov

customer_reviews.title: Great solid table
customer_reviews.text: Great solid table. My wife is in the design business and loves it. Took about 15 minutes to put together. We have it on an area rug on top of wood floors and it doesn't move with an accidental bump at all. Yet not too heavy that we can. It love it to vacuum. Can not speak for the longevity, abut has a great rustic look.
customer_reviews.author: Nitsujk

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy rustic coffee table
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and solid table. It’s very heavy and it is, as stated, rustic so the surface is not even. That’s fine with me because that’s what I was looking for. It took my daughter and me about 10-15 minutes to assemble. It’s in the family room which is mostly my husband’s space. I will be ordering more from this collection 😉
customer_reviews.author: TeresaO

customer_reviews.title: For function and beauty
customer_reviews.text: Omg! So many compliments this table is so well made ! I saw the exact table at another online store for twice the price - glad I chose to look for it on amazon! This is the perfect addition to our new living room! So well made and the wood is real and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: paula castellano

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Rustic Coffee Table!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a rustic imperfect coffee table then this is the one! Indestructible and perfect! We were going to try and make one just like this and probably would have spent more on all of the components. So glad we found this piece!
customer_reviews.author: RLT

customer_reviews.title: the top is very rough
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in this table. I guess that's what I get for buying furniture on amazon. The top is so rough it's extremely hard to clean. If you run a rag over it small pieces of wood get stuck in the rag and it's impossible to get them out. Everyone in my family has gotten a splinter from it. It's also very very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna E Welsh

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great piece of furniture, at a great price. Not too tough to assemble and weighs a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Browning

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Attractive Table
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels solid. Purchased the two end table set as well, they compliment this coffee table well. Have to pay attention while cleaning and ensure you're going with the grain.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I couldn't believe the quality of this table. It was exactly the rustic look we were looking for. Extremely solid and heavy, yet absolutely beautiful. We get SO MANY compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Risa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This table is seriously beautiful and a real deal for the money. I contemplated the look alike at pottery barn but the pottery barn one doesnt have a lower shelf and is quite a bit more money even with a discount sale. I had to return the first one I received because it had a crack but it was quickly replaced with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: This table was exactly what we wanted! It completes the decor in our room. The size is perfect for what we wanted. Not really sure if it is actually reclaimed wood, but it looks the part.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to of these for our great room and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Had been planning on buying the PB griffin table but found this for half the price and love it. I love the bottom shelf and the thickness of the wood and it weighs a ton!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this table!!!!! It’s the perfect weight and nothing about it looks cheap!!! Very nicely made! GREAT PRICE and fast shipping. Very EASY to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Alban

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee table. Heavy soild wood mine had an even top. Legs are black wood kinda gray green brown. Six screws takes about 10 minutes to assemble. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Product looks solid, but I guess I will have to wait for the bolts, screws, and whatever hardware comes with it, because it was missing from the two boxes it arrived in. 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table, absolutely love it, solid wood and fits so perfect
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Smith

customer_reviews.title: No HARDWARE
customer_reviews.text: Has no hardware! How do I put this table together!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy E Bates

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the simple lines and the wood style goes with other pieces I have in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Alison E Craig

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! It is extremely sturdy and heavy, and the grain on the table top is beautiful. Perfect as a coffee table in a household with 2 rambunctious boys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not include hardware
customer_reviews.text: The table looks nice, but no hardware was included in the package. Others seem to be having this same problem. I've called the manufacturer with no response. How have others resolved this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Breeden

customer_reviews.title: No hardware
customer_reviews.text: Update. Table is great. They first shipped with no hardware to assemble the rectified it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table at a great price. Is very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Lynn Lane

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new coffee table and absolutely love it!! It was super easy to put together and very sturdy. I love that it’s solid wood and I mean solid!! It’s so beautiful, a great addition to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Larson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to build.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! strong and easy to build , hope is last long :-)
customer_reviews.author: Netanel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Perfect size, super heavy. The only complaint would be that one of the long bolts didn't have any thread. Amazon was great to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Randy H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good buy. Solid wood. The legs are a little bit uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Great product - rustic, sturdy and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic order - would have given it 5 ratings although the piece came without the necessary screws to assemble. Good thing is that they're basic screws that can be picked up at a hardware store so using the specs from the guide I should be able to pick them up no problem. Will look great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: Alaterre AZMBA1220 Sonoma Rustic Natural Coffee Table, Large, Brown, 48",
product_meta.description: Size:48"Sonoma 48"wide large coffee table is perfect in front of your favorite couch. It's large top and shelf below provide extra room for your favorite items to display and store. Makes a statement in your living space with its reclaimed wood styling and strong metal legs. This product is made with a mix of new and reclaimed wood; due to the nature of reclaimed wood no piece is exactly alike; variations such as cracks, knots, etc. add to the piece's character.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 48" W x 32" D x 18" H; Shelf dimensions: 38.5" W x 25" D x 11.5" H
Open shelf on the bottom is perfect for storing photo albums, books, magazine or other decorative accents
Metal legs, solid wood tops with a mix of new and reclaimed wood
Assembly required; wipe clean with a dry cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars63 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
